reviews.review:
This is not a game. is a piece of art. 
If there is ever a hall of fame for video games, BioShock Infinite will surely has its place within.

JUEGAZOO Nada mas que decir, es un puto JUEGAZO.
Grande LEVINE!!

Esse Bioshock Infinite é simplesmente um dos melhores jogos que tem aqui na Steam, os gráficos não vão datar, a jogabilidade é muito boa e a história é uma das melhores que eu já pude experimentar. Se você jogou o Bioshock 1, compre esse com o Season Pass pois é nas 2 dlc's que a história se fecha completinha. Notas altíssimas e review unanimemente positivos é sinal de que toda essa gente não pode estar errada.
tis alright

[I]"Нет ничего прекраснее на свете, чем Элизабет в синем платье и корсете!"[/I]

[h1][I]✎∿Плюсы[/I][/h1]

1. Элизабет. Она чудо, самый живой и красивый персонаж, что я видел в играх. Мимика, выражения лица, всё как настоящее, даже рассердившись, она всё равно прекрасна! И вдобавок к этому, ещё и помогает в бою, патроны? Да, пожалуйста! Аптечку/Соли? Будь любезна! Отхлестать тебя плёткой, грязная свинья? О да, накажи меня!
2. Дизайн уровней и красота Колумбии убили наповал. Невозможно передать словами, как ощущаешь объём каждой постройки, даже "дом Элизабет", находясь в нескольких километрах, давит своей величиной! 
3. Очень круто сделали перемещение по локации с помощью крюка-магнита, с ним игра приобретает некую кинематографичность, кучу тактик и хорошее подспорье в мордобое.
4. От сюжета едет крыша. Он настолько круто продуман, сложен, запутан, что я минут 10 после конца игры не мог прийти в себя.
5. По атмосфере третья часть переплюнула даже первую, которая была едва ли не лучшая в этом плане. Каждый угол мира, как живой. Взрослые болтают о житейских делах, детишки плещутся в луже гидранта, на ярмарке можно отведать ваты и хот-доги.
6. Оружия теперь выше крыши, и в кои то веки, оно не только красиво стреляет, но и демонстрирует всю свою мощь. Энергетики доступны все по мере прохождения, большая часть сильно отличается от того, что производят в Востороге. Ещё появился щит, который при уничтожении снова пополняется через некоторое время.
7. Прокачка идёт через глюк-бутылочки (HP-Щит-Мана) и шмот, который даёт различные бонусы. Те же пассивные навыки в Восторге, только в профиль.
8. Над звуковым и музыкальным сопровождением поработали на славу, композиция Will the Circle be Unbroken до сих пор из головы не выходит.
9. Русская локализация от CGInfo.TV это почти эталон качественной озвучки, никакие Фаргусы и Бука рядом не стояли. Что уж говорить, Букера озвучивает Пётр Гланц, один из самых известных актёров дубляжа.
10. Очень хорошая оптимизация и стабильность игры, не было ни единого вылета!


[h1][I]✎∿Плюс-Минус[/I][/h1]

1. Не сказать, что графика сильно шагнула вперёд, но свет и лучи солнца сделаны просто шикарно. Тени здесь посредственные, особенно на лицах персонажей.
2. Смену оружия видимо решили сделать ближе к реальности, больше двух носить не получится. Тоже самое и с энергетиками, они не пропадают, но в панель активных также не больше двух, что неудобно.


[h1][I]✎∿Минусы[/I][/h1]

1. У всех, кроме ключевых героев, страшные eбaлищa в количестве 2-3 типов, напоминает какое-то фрик-шоу с баянами и гусями. Странный отбор у Комстока, однако.


[h1][i]✎∿Итого[/i][/h1]

[b]Третья часть вобрала в себя всё самое лучшее, добавила много интересных механик, сломала все сюжетные границы времени и пространства. Даже поменяв дизайн водных глубин на небесную ввысь, атмосфера игры не стала хуже, а наоборот, подняла планку качества. Эта игра дарит неповторимый опыт, эмоции и частенько напоминает хорошее драматическое кино. Одним словом – шедевр![/b]

E' un bellissimo FPS, con uno stile difficile da trovare altrove, accompagnato da una trama che ti cattura e ambientazioni meravigliose. Ciliegina sulla torta la nostra la nostra amica Elizabeth.
I due DLC della storia chiudono il cerchio della serie Bioshock. Lo trovo nettamente migliore dei tre.

It turns out all you need to be called one the greatest games of all time is some decent art direction and a half coherent plot.

Here we go... I loved Bioshock 1 and 2, and this game feels like someone who heard about those two games was assigned to make the third, I can't believe it's by the same studio and the same director.

First of all, the shooting is so incredibly boring and generic. You can only carry two guns at a time, one of the many stupid cliches this game picked up from other generic games. The guns all have the same gratification factor as a pea shooter, and the upgrades are boring, standard, incremental bumps in damage, spread, ammo count... I'm already yawning. They are also incredibly expensive, requiring you to grind or cheese some feature in order to earn enough money to justify them. They also only apply to individual guns, so while you might favor a shotgun and carbine build and invest all your money into them, the game still might suddenly force an underpowered pistol and smg on you when you run out of ammo.

There is also a clothes upgrade system that provides occasionally useful, but equally boring character upgrades that are relatively rare and forgettable.

 If only there were another game that did guns and upgrades right... Oh yeah, there's BIOSHOCK 2, where you could hold oodles of guns that had situational advantages and you could upgrade your preferred ones and mix them with your powers and tonic upgrades to have a legitimate build that complemented your play style. 

You also have a shield for no explicable reason that recharges when you hide around corners sucking your thumb a la Halo, which is a terrible way to pace the action, and another generic cliche stolen from other video games.

The powers in this game are clearly an afterthought, even though they were the mainstay of the previous two entries. They either slightly damage your opponents or momentarily waylay them. They are all a variation of that theme, even though there are supposedly 8 different vigors. Compare them to the plasmids of Bioshock two, where you had 12 different powers that did totally different things, and could be used in conjunction with different upgrades, tonics, weapons, and ammunition types to amazing effect, lending itself to multiple playthroughs with different playstyles.

Now for the story, on paper it seems like a passable episode of twilight zone but in execution it's just a mess. The acting is so ham-fisted, coming from talented actors that have given great performances in other media. Anyone calling it a stylistic choice outs themselves as not understanding the style of the pulpy, retrofuturistic genre. The worst offense comes from the cringeworthily cliched characters themselves, who on the whole fail to grow or change meaningfully throughout the story, with the possible exception of Elizabeth, who makes the odd transition from naive Disney princess to a reject Rick and Morty character over the duration of one bad day.

The DLCs seem to have been based on oh-so-edgy fan fiction published on Tumblr by someone who watched the Maltese Falcon once and has a fetish for female endangerment and mutilation. I'll be honest, I couldn't bring myself to finish them so it's possible that they all turn out to be a brilliant practical joke.

Compare that to Bioshock 1 and 2, where each character was steeped in charisma and enigma, so it was equally suprising and compelling if they chose to act treacherously or honorably. 

The level design, though featuring gorgeous art direction, is comprised of (for the most part) endless linear corridor shooting that only serve to highlight the mediocre shooting and powers. They are occasionally broken up by the skyline sequences, in which you can attach yourself to a rail and move about the level on different floating platforms, an enjoyable feature wasted on this linear game, one that would have been better served in a more open-world format.

The exceptional part of this game is, as I have said, the art direction. The game takes place on a floating city in a steampunk alternate history of the early 1900s. The city features that delightful post-colonial architecture typical of the era, decorated with extremely colorful trappings exemplary of the 1900s exceptionalist americana. All this against a backdrop of whimsical inventions ripped straight from a Jules Verne novel. If all the enemies were removed this game would be the best walking simulator of all time. 

All in all, I have to recommend Bioshock 2 to absolutely everyone. I hesitate to recommend Bioshock Infinite to anyone except pretentious neckbeards obsessed with the ending and exploitative DLCs, and steampunks with a high tolerance to pedantic busywork.

This game could be OK for players who love first-person shooters and are OK with the style of the game. This title is not probably so great if you are looking for a RPG.

This game is a masterpiece
This game properly describes sociality as implicative of the period, which deals with a topic of metaphysical in this series of BioShock was made differently against other game which contains the common subject.
As for the original one, it had been described as symbolic through Rapture of Dystopia of conflict between communism and capitalism.
To sum up, In the world exists a numberless amount of universes, but in the numberless amount of universes could exist the universe which got a completely different attribute due to the big event.
In that case, it could be this baptism at this point of in time.
The universe after being baptized would be the universe which exists in Comstock and Columbia, but the universe after not baptized would be the universe which exists in Booker and Ana.
Comstock who is in the universe of A and baptized would not be able to have his children and he would go to the universe of B and take Ana away from Booker, Booker who is in the universe of B would get back to the universe of A and bring her back from him and kill Comstock, but he realized it was also one of the innumerable of universes which has an element of A and to get back to the caused baptism which had been divided into A and B.
It was sad story that he in the end decided to be dead by his daughter.

Falls ihr bis zu meiner Review runtergescrollt und euch noch immer nicht das Spiel gekauft habt:
Zu einem linearen Shooter, der 5 Jahre alt ist, aber 2018 immer noch aufgrund seiner Technik und seines Inhaltes aufglänzt, muss man nicht viel sagen. Auch die Metascore spricht für sich.
Selbst die 30€ für das Spiel außerhalb eines Sales lohnen sich für die knapp zehn Stunden Spielspaß, da diese einen komplett an den Stuhl fesseln, aber die Geschichte auch noch stundenlanges Diskussionsmaterial außerhalb des Bildschirms bietet.
Für mich persönlich ist es ein Meilenstein in der FPS- Geschichte.

I picked this up in a Steam sale and it's easily one of the best value single player games I've ever bought. It's a fairly lengthy campaign with a lot of novel and entertaining mechanics. There's a healthy dose of scifi and steampunk, ramping up to some immensely mind-bending plot twists. I thoroughly enjoyed the attention to detail of the alternate-history landscape early on that had me distracting myself by examining as much as possible. The rendering of the character Elizabeth is one of few NPCs that I've ever cared about, a lot has been done to humanise her character.

I vaguely remember beating this game when it first released on Xbox 360. Well I wanted to dive back in and fully experience it so I booted it up in 4k and hit hard mode. If you're any sort of decent FPS player it won't present too much of a challenge save a few encounters(lady Comstock for me lol). I really enjoyed the story and game overall. If you catch it on sale don't hesitate to dive in, and the previous 2 games as well.

좋은 스토리와 좋은 상상력, 그걸 재현해내는 비주얼
游戏故事性是没得说，画面放到现在来看也很不错，但是这是我现在的台式机唯一款会无故退出的游戏，所以我只能哀伤的卸载游戏了，因为是神作所以不敢给差评
是在八月份游戏荒加上正在打折的时候入的 在之前就已经是有所耳闻而且很想一试的 打折正好就入了 整片玩下来感觉生化奇兵是真的很棒 也像热评说的一样游戏第九艺术的代表作品 伊丽莎白是个很好的AI 这点应该没人反对吧233

Это шедевр. Миры которые показаны в игре как отдельный вид искусства. Сюжет игры писали явно боги. Идея мультивселенных реализована на высоте. Отличается от предыдущих версий, однако есть отсылки к прошлым частям.
Советую любителям красивой графики и закрученных сюжетов.
A first-person shooter which is great fun to play and has a good story with a crazy end.

la historia es una de las mejores que he visto altamente recomendable 10/10 ,para aquellas personas que les guste historias de ciencia ficcion con mucha accion fps

Отличная игра для люителей сильных эмоций и экшена.
通关了1999模式，不得不说，这个游戏放在今天依然很棒。。如果可以给这款游戏更多的时间去打磨，那说不定一切体验会变得更好，只可惜这一切都伴随着工作室的解散而灰飞烟灭了。这是一款游戏也是一款艺术品

Un peu plus court que les précédents volets mais une claque au niveau gameplay et sénario.
Un jeu parfait avec un dénoument... à vous de finir le jeu.
- gameplay comme les précedents volet, nerveux et varié à vos souhait.
- OST parfaite, musiques comme bruitage d'ambience.
- une histoire un peu simple au premier abord mais s'intensifi avec votre temps de jeu.
Pour le prix 30€, il les vaut largement.
